formComponent.msgSuccess: Great success! Your form has been submitted successfully.
formComponent.msgError: Oops, there are errors in the form. Please review the submission and try again.

field.errEmail: Please provide a valid email address.
field.errMin: Please provide a value greater than or equal to {0}.
field.errMax: Please provide a value less than or equal to {0}.
field.errMaxLength: Please provide no more than {maxLength} characters.
field.errPattern: Please provide a value matching the pattern {0}.
field.errEqualTo: Please provide the same value again.
field.errSize: Please provide a value between {minLength} and {maxLength} characters long.
field.errRange: Please provide a value between {0} and {1}.

file.errExtensions: The file {file} is invalid, allowed file types are: {extensions}
file.errMaxSize: The file size for {file} ({size}) exceeds the maximum upload size of {minSize}
file.errMinSize: The file size for {file} ({size}) needs to be at least {maxSize}

image.msgFileOverwriteWarning: The original image will be overwritten. Please save your changes to upload the new image

email.errRegex: Please provide a valid email address
email.errEmailMatch: The email addresses do not match

password.errRegex: The password must contain at least 8 characters, one upper-case letter, one lower-case letter, and one number
